title: The Adventures of Gulliver
resume: The Adventures of Gulliver is a television cartoon produced by Hanna-Barbera Productions, created in 1968. The show is based on the novel Gulliver's Travels. The show originally aired Saturday mornings on ABC-TV between September 14, 1968 and September 5, 1970. 17 episodes were produced, which were syndicated as part of The Banana Splits And Friends Show in the early 1970s.
